backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence, impacted files, components, and test IDs for ZIP automation and stable download path features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files and build scripts.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for logs, node_modules, build outputs, export artifacts, and environment files.
frontend/deploy/domain.txt: Specifies the deployment domain string used for build validation.
frontend/EXPORTING.md: Docs describing automatic ZIP generation during production builds with prerequisites and quick-start steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/build-with-zip.mjs: Build script running the production build and automatically generating the ZIP export without prompts.
frontend/scripts/export-zip.mjs: Creates shank-game.zip from dist/, saves it to export/ and dist/, and logs progress with error handling.
Validates deploy/domain.txt for format, permitted characters, and length, exiting with clear errors.
frontend/src/components/TouchControls.ts: Touch control pad component emitting direction changes via arrow buttons.
frontend/src/game/levels.ts: Defines five level configs with obstacles and helpers for retrieving levels and checking obstacle collisions.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Renders the game grid, obstacles, apple, and shank sprites with pixel-art styling.
frontend/src/game/skins.ts: Defines skin options for shank and apple sprites and provides localStorage helpers and sprite lookup functions.
frontend/src/game/useShankGame.ts: Implements the main snake-style game logic, including movement, collisions, levels, scoring, skins, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, refreshing it when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles and Tailwind layers defining arcade-themed colors, fonts, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the main game UI, HUD, controls, and integrates the game hook and skin selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and utilities for the game's visual theme.
project_state.json: Maintains the project's versioned state, including feature definitions, issues, and architectural notes for the shank-eats-apples game. Highlights current problems with ZIP export flow and invalid domain names.
